name: YOUR ONLY VERB IS KILL
description:
YOUR ONLY VERB IS KILL is a game borne out of a desire to take as much of the asinine criticism older, entrenched generations levy toward young people, especially those rooted in unspoken class warfare, and transform them into an off-kilter, but hopefully cathartic fantasy.

There was a time when I'd hoped we were on the tail end of this stuff, but considering recent developments, I don't think it'll be going away anytime soon.

Kill capitalism. Kill heteronormativity. Kill the worship of ignorance and fear of technology. Go forth, my millennial comrades, and kill.

Fullscreen recommended.
